text: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
author: Hal Borland

text: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.
author: Laurence J. Peter

text: Beware the fury of a patient man.
author: John Dryden

text: Let him that hath no power of patience retire within himself, though even there he will have to put up with himself.
author: Baltasar Gracian
